医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
家长和临床医生就儿科决策达成共识其他人应该如何为儿科患者做出决定？几十年来，学术文献中一直存在关于儿童医疗决策的伦理原则的争论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Parents-and-clinicians-reach-consensus-on-pediatric-decision-making.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Parents-and-clinicians-reach-consensus-on-pediatric-decision-making.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78d3c5e3-7aab-4b4d-8385-9669492080e6 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 22:09:29 -0400 Parents and clinicians reach consensus on pediatric decision-making
更正：空气污染与老年人非肺癌风险增加有关哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院领导的一项研究表明，长期接触细颗粒空气污染物 (PM2.5) 和二氧化氮 (NO2) 可能会增加老年人患非肺癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/CORRECTION-Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-risk-of-non-lung-cancers-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/CORRECTION-Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-risk-of-non-lung-cancers-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc3c9c9d-2b3a-4340-8092-2e42c26c71ac Fri, 11 Aug 2023 21:33:23 -0400 CORRECTION: Air pollution linked to increased risk of non-lung cancers in older adults
科学家利用机器学习和人工智能指导疫苗开发从解决家庭作业挑战到起草电子邮件，人们正在发现自然语言处理工具（例如生成人工智能（AI）引擎）的大量应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Scientists-leverage-machine-learning-and-AI-to-guide-vaccine-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Scientists-leverage-machine-learning-and-AI-to-guide-vaccine-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cadaa3b8-ce38-449d-b057-681e642111e5 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 16:35:49 -0400 Scientists leverage machine learning and AI to guide vaccine development
葡萄糖激酶激活剂诱导高脂饮食小鼠肝脏脂质积累研究人员证明，葡萄糖激酶激活可有效降低高脂饮食引起的肥胖小鼠的血糖，同时可能会增加触发 PERK-UPR 通路的肝脏脂质积累增加的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Glucokinase-activators-induce-hepatic-lipid-accumulation-in-mice-with-high-fat-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Glucokinase-activators-induce-hepatic-lipid-accumulation-in-mice-with-high-fat-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a1bcbcd-2a8b-4086-9eff-7c39fc039600 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 15:41:08 -0400 Glucokinase activators induce hepatic lipid accumulation in mice with high-fat diet
分层抽样比随机抽样更有效地检测婴儿配方奶粉中的污染物婴儿配方奶粉生产商采用全面的食品安全系统，包括产品测试以确保这些系统正常运行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Stratified-sampling-more-efficient-than-random-sampling-for-detecting-contaminants-in-infant-formula.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Stratified-sampling-more-efficient-than-random-sampling-for-detecting-contaminants-in-infant-formula.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=163adadc-24ca-4eb2-8ae9-2ec68f0db86f Fri, 11 Aug 2023 15:36:28 -0400 Stratified sampling more effective than random sampling for detecting contaminants in infant formula
有问题的社交媒体使用与抑郁症状有关伦敦大学学院研究人员的一项新研究发现，接受针对社交媒体使用问题的治疗可以有效改善抑郁症患者的心理健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Problematic-social-media-use-linked-to-depression-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Problematic-social-media-use-linked-to-depression-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8d2731a-50b4-4b7f-b86d-4a15510c749c Fri, 11 Aug 2023 15:21:43 -0400 Problematic social media use linked to depression symptoms
新的基因疗法有望治疗融合驱动的癌症一项新的研究为所谓的融合驱动的癌症提供了一种有前途的治疗方法，这种癌症目前通常难以治愈。这些融合驱动的癌症是由细胞分裂错误导致不同基因融合引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/New-gene-therapy-shows-promise-for-treating-fusion-driven-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/New-gene-therapy-shows-promise-for-treating-fusion-driven-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b93d3a5-4423-4400-a889-e5345ffdda93 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 15:03:08 -0400 New gene therapy shows promise for treating fusion-driven cancers
基因多样化的小鼠揭示了对 SARS-CoV-2 先天免疫反应的关键差异杰克逊实验室的研究人员创建了一组基因多样化的小鼠，可以准确模拟人类对 SARS-CoV-2 感染的高度可变的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Genetically-diverse-mice-reveal-key-differences-in-innate-immune-responses-to-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Genetically-diverse-mice-reveal-key-differences-in-innate-immune-responses-to-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a74fc607-2779-460a-afca-b586ac2e5437 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 14:37:29 -0400 Genetically diverse mice reveal key differences in innate immune responses to SARS-CoV-2
研究表明 Gasdermin D 蛋白在食物免疫耐受中的作用中国科学院中国科学技术大学朱舒教授课题组阐明了Gasdermin D（GSDMD）蛋白在小肠食物免疫耐受中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Research-illustrates-the-role-of-Gasdermin-D- Protein-in-immunity-tolerance-to-food.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Research-illustrates-the-role-of-Gasdermin-D- Protein-in-immunity-tolerance-to-food.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=439ae9bb-fd39-4d2a-86c8-909e5cea7dc8 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 14:30:48 -0400 Research illustrates the role of Gasdermin D protein in immunity tolerance to food
研究确定了 135 个与人类肤色相关的基因超过八十亿人的皮肤、头发和眼睛的颜色是由称为黑色素的光吸收色素决定的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Study-identizes-135-genes-linked-with- human-skin-color.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Study-identizes-135-genes-linked-with- human-skin-color.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b49bf6e-8149-4afb-9dae-b51b51303027 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 14:20:49 -0400 Study identifies 135 genes associated with human skin color
